name: Torchlight (itch) (bejules)
description:
You’re a miner, searching the caves for gems and riches. Your only source of light comes from your trusty torch! However, every time you take a step, you notice the flames of your torch get dimmer and dimmer. How much treasure can you collect before you are submerged in darkness?

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 103 by Julia Sherbal

Assets:

Cave Explorer

Deep Caves

Minecart

Sound Effects: Zapsplat

Music: Derek Fietcher
